title: Mississippi Grind review – buddy gambling tale with no sting
text: Mississippi Grind review – buddy gambling tale with no sting Thursday, 22 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) An alpha Ryan Reynolds takes on a smart deadbeat gambler Ben Mendelsohn, for a road-trip movie that never reaches its big pay-off Machiavelli is supposed to have said that gambling is something to encourage in your enemy’s country but suppress in your own. It’s hard to know how or if to apply that pessimistic maxim to ...
